stories.title: Eight skiers found dead after California avalanche
stories.summary: Fifteen skiers went missing on Tuesday following a massive avalanche in California's Lake Tahoe region. One person remains missing but is presumed dead.

stories.title: Trump says UK’s Starmer making ‘a big mistake’ with Chagos Islands deal
stories.summary: The US president warned the military base on Diego Garcia may be needed to respond to possible attack from Iran.

stories.title: Meta’s Zuckerberg pushes back on social media youth addiction claims
stories.summary: In a Los Angeles court, the Meta CEO was questioned about whether Instagram’s design contributed to addictive behavior.

prompt: Editorial news illustration divided into exactly 3 equal vertical panels side by side. Panel 1: Eight skiers found dead after California avalanche. Panel 2: Trump says UKs Starmer making a big mistake with Chagos Islands deal. Panel 3: Metas Zuckerberg pushes back on social media youth addiction claims. Style: bold, cinematic, modern editorial magazine cover art, rich colors, dramatic lighting, clean composition, professional photojournalism aesthetic. Each panel has a distinct scene. No text, no words, no letters, no captions, no overlays of any kind.
